'

Mad Lit is an html5 mash-up app created by Linda Crilly* with Sencha Touch 2.3.1 using RESTful APIs: (1) Voice RSS API, (2) Open Library Cover API and (3) World Weather Online.

The background image is licensed from Dreamstime

Powered by World Weather Online

Mad Lit is a game where words in classic literature are replaced by user generated words. The Voice RSS API is a text-to-speech API and is incorporated to read aloud the final composed text. The Open Library Cover API is incorporated to display the book cover of the classic literature. World Weather Online is incorporated to display the current temperature in the setting location of the classic literature.

*Contact: madlit.llcrilly@gmail.com
